item.title: Windows 11 calls a zip file a 'postcode file' in UK English
Deepmind Alphadev: Faster sorting algorithms discovered using deep RL
item.description: - AlphaDev is an AI program created by researchers at DeepMind that uses deep reinforcement learning to discover and generate efficient sorting algorithms from scratch.

item.title: uBlock Origin 1.50.0
item.description: - uBlock Origin 1.50.0 has been released with various fixes and changes - The update adds new features like the ability to remove attributes and injecting scriptlets in MAIN or ISOLATED world - It's available for Firefox, Chromium, Edge, and Opera, with install and review pending for some platforms.

item.title: Reddit's Recently Announced API Changes, & the future of /r/blind
item.description: - The r/blind community is protesting Reddit's recent API pricing changes that will affect third-party apps like those used by visually impaired moderators and users.

item.title: Royal Navy says quantum navigation test a success
Tell HN: "I don't care about cookies" extension bought by Avast, users jump ship
item.description: - Avast has acquired the "I don't care about cookies" extension and users have expressed concerns about privacy.

item.title: Apple's game porting toolkit is fantastic. Cyberpunk 2077 at Ultra on an M1 MBP
Apple removes $99 dev account requirement for first iOS 17 & macOS 14 betas
item.description: - Apple has removed the $99 developer account requirement for access to first iOS 17 and macOS 14 betas.

item.description: - This text does not contain any content related to cutting-edge tech news or information on DirectX 12 support on macOS.
